meanings.definition: A soldier armed with a harquebus.
meanings.sent1: The harquebusiers marched in formation, ready for battle.
meanings.sent2: The king's army consisted of many harquebusiers.
meanings.sent3: The harquebusiers tried to use their weapons as fishing rods, but it didn't work well.
meanings.sent4: In the heat of the battle, the harquebusiers' shots rang out like thunder.
meanings.sent5: The harquebusiers' uniforms were so colorful, they stood out on the battlefield.

meanings.definition: A group of soldiers armed with harquebuses.
meanings.sent1: As the enemy approached, the harquebusiers formed a defensive line.
meanings.sent2: The harquebusiers advanced cautiously, ready to fire at any moment.
meanings.sent3: The harquebusiers decided to have a shooting competition to pass the time.
meanings.sent4: The harquebusiers' firepower was like a storm unleashed on the battlefield.
meanings.sent5: The harquebusiers' precision in shooting was unmatched by any other unit.
